name: The Battle Between Arnault de Lorraine and His Wife Lydia
description: The Battle Between Arnault de Lorraine and His Wife Lydia; Loyset Liédet (Flemish, active about 1448 - 1478), and Pol Fruit (Flemish, active about 1468); Written: Brussels, Belgium; written 1463 - 1465; illuminated 1467 - 1472; Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment; Leaf: 23.7 x 18.9 cm (9 5/16 x 7 7/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 6, leaf 11; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Battle Between Arnault de Lorraine and His Wife Lydia
medium: Tempera colors, gold leaf, and gold paint on parchment
